entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
